title: Xereth almost uplayable because Q wont Charge
body:
Ive tried everything, but his q will start to charge, than half way through make rapid clicking noises and will cancel the charge half way through, still shotting q, butnever getting to max range.
AS a side note, his q will charge if its not quick casted but thats litterally the worst way to do it possible when you need to let it loose quickly, as far as i know its only broken in quick cast.

replies.body: It charges fine for me (as of yesterday). Are you using any strange macros or gaming mouse?

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=KxwfyZAj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-14T21:36:43.833+0000)
>
> It charges fine for me (as of yesterday). Are you using any strange macros or gaming mouse?

nope, completely normal set up, it was fine for me last week but when i played him today it refused to charge
just tried it in a custom game and it still doesnt work
